Module java.money
Package javax.money

Class MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
javax.money.AbstractContextBuilder<B,​C>
javax.money.AbstractQueryBuilder<MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder,​MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery>
javax.money.MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder
public final class MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder
extends AbstractQueryBuilder<MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder,​MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery>
Builder class for creating new instances of MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery that can be passed to access MonetaryAmountFactory instances using a possible complex query.

Note this class is NOT thread-safe.

See Also:
Monetary.getAmountFactory(MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery), MonetaryAmountFactory

    Sets the flag if the scale should fixed, meaning minimal scale and maximal scale are always equally sized.

    Sets the maximal scale to be supported.

      Returns:
      this Builder for chaining.

    • build

      public MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery build()
      Creates a new instance of MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery based on the values of this Builder. Note that the Builder supports creation of several Builder instances from the a common Builder instance. But be aware that the keys and values contained are themselves not recursively cloned (deep-copy).
      Specified by:
      build in class AbstractQueryBuilder<MonetaryAmountFactoryQueryBuilder,​MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery>
      Returns:
      a new MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery instance.
